name: D. H. Hill Makerspace
description: The D.H. Hill Makerspace is located on the first floor of the D.H. Hill Library. This space gives students, faculty, and staff hands-on access to the emerging technologies of making, including 3D printers, 3D scanners, electronics prototyping kits, sewing machines, a laser cutter, and many other Maker tools.

address.streetAddress: 2 Broughton Drive, Campus Box 7132, Raleigh, NC 27606
